entry.title: [RFC] Lightning invoice/payment format draft
entry.summary: In a message to an unknown recipient, ZmnSCPxj corrects their understanding of bech32. Upon reviewing the bech32 specification again, they realized that the character "1" is not allowed in the data part, which means that the last "1" digit in the bech32 string serves as the separator between the human-readable and data parts. ZmnSCPxj asks the recipient to ignore their previous message and apologizes for any confusion caused.
